ygData.subject: Re: Short Flight or Long Walk?

::Spears::

She stopped dead cold in her tracks and blushed.  That question blew 
her mind away.  She stared at Striker for a moment.
"Like him? I hardly know him. Sure he's a fine and talented warrior, 
but geez. What the inferno kind of question is that?"
She face turning a deeper shade of red.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker nods, noting that Spears was changing the subject. "Ever 
since our 
> ship crashed on this planet. He's a brave warrior. Died without a 
complaint," 
> he says, looking at her as a grin crosses his face, "You like him?"
